name: Below Post Title and Below Post Content Ads
author: Santhosh veer

sections.description:
Hai this is a Simple Plugin For Insert Adsense Code & other HTML widgets Below Post Title and Below Post Content.

This plugin Help the Bloggers to Increase their Ads and Affiliate CTR & Conversions.

  • Insert Google Adsense Below Post Title and Below Post content
  • Supports HTML Widgets
  • it Does not Support PHP Codes
  • Supported all Responsive HTML Tags

If you Have Any Questions Related in this Plugin Please Use the WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
sections.installation:
Upload the Below Post Title and Below Post Content Ads folder to the /wp-content/plugins/directory

Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why we use this Plugin?

This plugin help us to display the AdSense ad or other widget’s under the Below Post Title and Content

It supports all themes?

Yes, it supports all WordPress themes.

Can I use other HTML widgets Here?

Yes, it supports all type of HTML widgets.

Wheather its affect My plugin and themes?

No, this Plugin is Very Light weighted it does not affect your other files and designs.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum, and I will take care of any issue.
